title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 684.6 - Work order system recommended
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 684.6 - Work order system recommended

State Regulations

It is recommended that utilities use a work order system
for recording plant additions and retirements. The work orders should contain
the date, description and location of each plant addition and retirement, together with an itemized record of materials, labor and other costs, and the
plant or other accounts to be charged or credited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
684.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
